content.rendered:
Thanks for stopping by the site. The slide deck  and the data used for the Nifty Report are found below. You can follow me on twitter at http://twitter.com/niftymarketing

 

Data Set – Nifty Research

 

SMX Advanced 2011 – Hardcore Local Search Tactics

View more presentations from niftymarketing
